	-_tkns = sChunk * _price (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#161)

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract TokenERC20 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#64-120) has payable functions:
	 - TokenERC20.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#117-119)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [TokenERC20](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#L64-L120) has payable functions:
	 - [TokenERC20.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#L117-L119)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
_0xEthereumToken.getAirdrop(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#139-152) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[address(this)] = balances[address(this)].sub(aAmt / 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#144)
	- balances[_refer] = balances[_refer].add(aAmt / 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#145)
	- Transfer(address(this),_refer,aAmt / 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#146)

detectors.description:
_0xEthereumToken.startAirdrop(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#185-191) should emit an event for: 
	- aSBlock = _aSBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#186) 
	- aEBlock = _aEBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#187) 
	- aAmt = _aAmt (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#188) 
	- aCap = _aCap (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#189)

_0xEthereumToken.startSale(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#192-199) should emit an event for: 
	- sSBlock = _sSBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#193) 
	- sEBlock = _sEBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#194) 
	- sChunk = _sChunk (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#195) 
	- sPrice = _sPrice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#196) 
	- sCap = _sCap (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#197)

	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#23)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- TokenERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#108-110)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- TokenERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_0xEthereumToken.sol#90-95)
